Message:
After temporarily
parting ways with Stella,
I headed deep into
the forest of Brook.
I used to live here with my master.

It’s been a while since
I’ve come back to visit,
but...wow.
Even the library’s
completely covered in dust.

Alright, cleaning everything
all at once will be a breeze
with some wind magic!

...Uuu. Okay, no shortcuts.
I’ll clean everything
one by one with a duster...

Oh, now this one takes me back—
Master’s pumpkin pie recipe!
I believe we made one
together one day.

I kept messing up,
and she couldn’t stop laughing...
Hehe!

My master isn’t here
in our world anymore,
but I can see her again like this...
in my memories...

Let’s see what’s
on the next page...
Huh?

“To my dear Merlyn.
So, you’re finally old enough
to need this, huh?”

This is Master’s handwriting...
Did she know
I’d find this eventually?
